channel.title: CVE Feed for Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) -- Child Theme Creator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) -- Child Theme Creator

item.title: CVE-2024-43276|2024-08-21T16:42:18.171Z -- svetoslav%20marinov%20%28slavi%29 -- child%20theme%20creator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) Child Theme Creator allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Child Theme Creator: from n/a through 1.5.4.
